summary: Full app rewrite, lots of changes
changes: Added dark mode/light mode toggle
Update ammo spreadsheet, header is now fixed
Update ammo scatter plot chart. Can now hover to preview calibre values
Removed Content Creators page
Removed Checklist page
Added Required Items page
Added more items to the More Resources page
Lots of improvements across the app
Updated all ammo values
Update spreadsheet component

summary: Added all known spawns for Reserve keys
Updated some prices on the item values table
changes: All known key spawns for the Reserve keys are now marked, with screenshots and video.

The prices for the following items were updated/added: Bitcoin, Broken GPhone, Electric Drill, Fuel Conditioner, Gunpowder (Kite, Hawk & Eagle), Morphone, Elite Pliers, Long Flat Screwdriver, PSU, Wires, Silencerco Hybrid 46 Suppressor, Holosun HS401G5 Reflex Sight, Powercord, Broken LCD, Pile of Meds, Silicone Tube, Analog Thermometer, Capacitors, NIXXOR Lens, Lightbulb, Disposable Syringe, Water Filter, Akali, IFAK, Radiator Helix.
Updated ammo
Added Reserve extractions with images
Added RB-AM Military Base Key
Updated Interchange extract names
Improved compression of key spawn images and moved them to a CDN
Added the map extractions page with all extracts for each map.
Works the same as the Key Spawn maps. Search by extract name or by map.

summary: Added screenshots & videos for Health Resort Utility Room Key and Labs Blue Keycard location #2.
Updated screenshots & videos for Office 112 Key, East Wing 328 & 226 Key, and West Wing 203 Key.
changes: Added screenshot and video for Health Resort Utility Room Key. This was missed in the initial update.
Added screenshot and video for Labs Blue Keycard location #2.
Updated screenshot and video for Office 112 Key.
Updated screenshot and video for East Wing 328 & 226 Key
Updated screenshot and video for West Wing 203 Key.
Fix Dorm Room 214 Key description.

summary: Added screenshots and video guides for almost all key spawn locations
Added 'Item Values' page. A searchable table featuring values & value per slot of barter items
changes: Added screenshots and video guides for almost all key spawn locations. Some screenshots & videos missing due to not having the required keys to access spawn locations
Will be continually updating these screenshots & videos to try and get key spawns in each one
Added 'Item Values' page. A searchable table featuring values & value per slot of barter items
Modified the 'Updates' dashboard card, and added this changelog list
